name: thumbnail-generator
title: Thumbnail Generator
content:
Overview

This application generates 200x200 pixel thumbnails from images while maintaining aspect ratio. Built using Pillow, it centers the image on a white background and outputs as JPEG format.

Features

  • Fixed 200x200 pixel thumbnail size
  • Maintains aspect ratio with centered positioning
  • White background for non-square images
  • High-quality JPEG output

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a thumbnail image with the suffix _thumb.jpg in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Creating preview thumbnails for image galleries
  • Generating profile picture thumbnails
  • Creating uniform-sized icons for listings
  • Preparing images for email or mobile display
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/thumbnail_generator.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
